Text: "The Chain of Love" is a song written by Rory Lee Feek and Jonnie Barnett, and recorded by American country music singer Clay Walker.
Triplets:<Rory Lee Feek

--------------------
Text: The Chain of Love:  "The Chain of Love" reached a peak of number 3 on the "Billboard" Hot Country Singles & Tracks (now Hot Country Songs) charts, providing Walker with his thirteenth Top Ten hit on that chart.
